testcase.name: user add product to cart
testcase.system-out: Given user login with standard user.........................................passed When user in product page...................................................passed And user click button add to cart...........................................passed And user click icon cart....................................................passed Then displays product descriptions..........................................passed

testcase.name: remove product in cart using error user
testcase.system-out: Given user login with error user............................................passed When user in product page...................................................passed And user click button add to cart...........................................passed And user click remove button in product page................................passed Then the remove button cant click...........................................passed

testcase.name: Checkout Product
testcase.system-out: Given user login with standard user.........................................passed When user click button add to cart..........................................passed And user click icon cart....................................................passed And user click checkout button..............................................passed Then user completes information data........................................passed And user click continue button..............................................passed And display checkout information............................................passed And click finish button.....................................................passed Then display popup success..................................................passed

testcase.name: Display detail product with click image product
testcase.system-out: Given user login with standard user.........................................passed When user in product page...................................................passed And user click image product................................................passed Then display product information............................................passed

testcase.name: user login with invalid username
testcase.system-out: Given user already open login page..........................................passed When user input invalid username............................................passed And user input password.....................................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed Then error message invalid username.........................................passed
